extension_description.message: Fetolela sengwalwa se se kgethilwego letlakaleng la wepe gomme o fetolele go sebopego se se laeditšwego.

turn_off_description.message: Konopo ya go fetolela e tla tšwelela nako le nako ge sengwalwa se kgethilwe

turn_on_description.message: Konopo ya go fetolela e ka se bontšhwe ge sengwalwa se kgethilwe eupša o sa kgona go fetolela ka go klika leswao la Pro Fetolela ka gare ga bara ya didirišwa

ui_language_description.message: Kgetha polelo ya UI ya tlwaelo

target_language_description.message: Kgetha polelo ya nepišo ya tlwaelo

auto_switch.message: Ka go itiriša fetogela go polelo ya bobedi yeo e nepišitšwego

auto_switch_description.message: Ge sengwalwa se se kgethilwego e le leleme la nepišo la maitirelo, se fetolele go leleme la bobedi la nepišo

second_target_language.message: Polelo ya Bobedi yeo e Nepišitšwego

second_target_language_description.message: Kgetha polelo ya bobedi ya nepišo ya tlwaelo

target_format_description.message: Kgetha sebopego sa nepišo sa tlwaelo, sebopego se ka fetoga ka phaneleng ya phetolelo

auto_set_format.message: Ka tsela e iketsang beha sebopeho sa default

auto_set_format_description.message: Ge o fetola sebopego ka go phanele ya phetolelo, beakanya sebopego se se kgethilwego go sebopego sa maitirelo

format_and_order.message: Sebopego sa phanele ya phetolelo le tatelano

format_and_order_description.message: Fometa melato yeo e ka fetošwago ka phanele ya phetolelo le tatelano ya pontšho

translate_button_on_description.message: Konopo ya go fetolela e tla tšwelela nako le nako ge sengwalwa se kgethilwe

translate_button_off.message: O se ke wa bontšha konope ya Fetolela

translate_button_off_description.message: Konopo ya go fetolela e ka se bontšhwe ge sengwalwa se kgethilwe eupša o sa kgona go fetolela ka go klika leswao la Pro Fetolela ka gare ga bara ya didirišwa
